definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: This is an automatic guitar tuner for your phone.
sentences.chinese: 這是你的電話一個自動的吉他調音師。

sentences.english: I simply wasn’t up to the task of learning to tune a guitar last night.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，昨晚我無法完成學習吉他調音的任務。

sentences.english: Mixers are available for a wide variety of naturally aspirated and turbocharged engines.
sentences.chinese: 調音臺可用於各種各樣的自然吸氣和渦輪增壓引擎。

sentences.english: Polyphony is as important as the right hand.
sentences.chinese: 在復調音樂中與右手一樣重要。

sentences.english: He uses the form of echo tone of music to configure the novel.
sentences.chinese: 採用復調音樂的形式來結構小說。

sentences.english: The provino (tuning table) is used to check the tuning of the reeds.
sentences.chinese: 調音臺用來檢測簧片的聲音。

sentences.english: Have you ever tried to tune a guitar by ear?
How many pianoare there in Massachusetts?
sentences.chinese: 馬薩諸塞州有多少鋼琴調音師？

sentences.english: The  orchestra is tuning up and the concert is about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 管絃樂隊正在調音，音樂會馬上就要開始。

sentences.english: How many piano tuners are there in Massachusetts?
sentences.chinese: 馬薩諸塞州有多少鋼琴調音師？

sentences.english: It is possible to separate certain vocals and instruments from a mix by frequency-weighted compression.
sentences.chinese: 通過頻率壓縮從調音臺分離部分聲樂和設備是可能的。

sentences.english: I can personally attest to the subtle potency of this Attunement.
sentences.chinese: 我能以我個人來證明這個調音的精妙效力。

sentences.english: Tuner is a helper tool for tuning musical instruments.
sentences.chinese: 調音器是一種樂器調音的輔助工具。

sentences.english: Tuner is a helper tool for tuning musical instruments.
sentences.chinese: 調音器是一種樂器調音的輔助工具。

sentences.english: This will load a practice tuning file that contains inharmonicity measurements.
sentences.chinese: 將打開一個包含有失諧度測量結果的調音文件。

sentences.english: It takes skill to tune a piano.

definition: music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
to compose a piece of music
